title: When will the SKT T1 2016 skins be avalible. If they will ever be.
body:
I have currently have SKT T1 Jhin on my wishlist and it is the only skin I desire right now. So I just want some info.

    I don't know if this goes here. BTW

I'm new to this. 0_o

replies.body: When the legacy vault opens. Its opens when worlds starts which i think is around October. Im a jhin main and have that skin and DAMN. Favorite skin of his for sure.
It should be available in the store when the new patch rolls out, which I believe is on May 8th :)
